about_the_game:
Prepare for an intergalactic adventure in Flappy Alien!

Navigate your way through the vast expanse of space, piloting a nimble UFO on a thrilling journey. Dodge obstacles, test your reflexes, and aim for the highest score in this addictive arcade game.

Flappy Alien offers a perfect blend of challenge and simplicity, making it an ideal game for quick sessions or extended play. Take off into space and see how far you can go!

  • Simple Controls: Press the space button or click to thrust your UFO upward and navigate through treacherous obstacles.
  • Endless Challenges: The randomly generated obstacles keep every playthrough unique and engaging.
  • High Score System: Compete against yourself and others to achieve the highest score possible.
detailed_description:
Prepare for an intergalactic adventure in Flappy Alien!

Navigate your way through the vast expanse of space, piloting a nimble UFO on a thrilling journey. Dodge obstacles, test your reflexes, and aim for the highest score in this addictive arcade game.

Flappy Alien offers a perfect blend of challenge and simplicity, making it an ideal game for quick sessions or extended play. Take off into space and see how far you can go!

  • Simple Controls: Press the space button or click to thrust your UFO upward and navigate through treacherous obstacles.
  • Endless Challenges: The randomly generated obstacles keep every playthrough unique and engaging.
  • High Score System: Compete against yourself and others to achieve the highest score possible.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS or SteamOS 3.0+ (64-bit only)
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan-compatible GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or Apple M1 chip
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-compatible GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or Apple M1 chip
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-compatible GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Prepare for an intergalactic adventure in Flappy Alien! Navigate your UFO through space, dodge obstacles, and aim for the highest score.
